attributes.action: Force the BBC to take responsibility and sack Jonathon Ross over the phone scandal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should someone with such obvious lack of decency and common sense be paid 18 million pounds by the British taxpayer. The BBC should sack him now and anyone else directly involved in the Phone prank saga involving Andrew Sachs and his Granddaughter...

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
